global.pmallow:
*Hii,This is Ravana*
*An assistant of My Master.*
My Master is busy right now.
Kindly Leave your Message.

_I will inform him about your message asap......_
global.pmblock:
❌ Blocked*

 You have been blocked for spamming.

 _ Powered by Ravana_
global.pmwarn:
✋Hii* 
Please don't spam else I'll block you for spamming. _You have ${checkPermit.times} warning(s)._

 *Powered by Ravana*
global.permited:
Hii ${tname} Sir*

Now You are permitted by my owner to pm now.

 *Powered by Ravana
global.revoked:
*Hii ${tname} Sir*

Your pm permit permission has been prevoked now.

 _Powered by Ravana_
